name: Kahtoola NANOspikes Footwear Traction - Unisex
description: Black ice? Unshoveled sidewalks? Treacherous winter trails? No problem. Move through winter with these low-profile traction spikes. Strong tungsten carbide spikes bite into hard ice, while the flexible design adapts to uneven terrain.10 tungsten carbide spikes per foot bite into ice and hard packed snow.Low-profile, lightweight design results in a natural-feeling stride.Flexible design adapts to terrain.Rubber straps fit easily on a wide range of shoe types.Rubber remains flexible down to -35C.Includes tote sack.
